user.title: Set up Tasmota MiElHVAC
user.description:
This integration will automatically discover Mitsubishi Electric HVAC devices controlled by Tasmota's MiElHVAC driver.

Devices publishing MiElHVAC data to `tele/+/SENSOR` will be detected and linked to their Tasmota devices.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only one instance is allowed. HVAC devices will be discovered automatically.

init.description: Configure advanced options for the integration.
